description: First tetrahedral co-ordinate; repeat m (m+1)*(m+2)/2 times.
comments: If {(X,Y,Z)} are triples of nonnegative integers with X>=Y>=Z ordered by X, Y and Z, then X=A056556(n), Y=A056557(n) and Z=A056558(n)
formula: a(n)=floor[x] where x is the (largest real) solution to x^3+3x^2+2x-6n=0; a(A000292(n))=n+1a(n+1) = a(n)==A056558(n) ? a(n)+1 : a(n) - _Graeme McRae_, Jan 09 2007
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 26 2000
